content.text:
[@peg](@vEJe4hdnbHJl549200IytOeA3THbnP0oM+JQtS1u+8o=.ed25519) This looks great!

I was actually going to suggest just calling the Scuttlebot plugin, sort of like how I use `sbot blobContent.get` and `sbot blobContent.publish`, but doing a full Node module may be the right call here. Super excited to try it!
